content: fingerless gloves are my solution to cold hands year-round they are especially useful when working on the computer i designed these gloves with a nice ribbed pattern on the back that helps grip your hand and a smooth stockinette palm for maximum productivity i have previously had issues with thumb gussets fitting me properly so i really wanted a custom fit this versatile pattern can work for anyone and is very adaptable to many colors and styles of yarn the pattern is written for 3 sizes and is extremely easy to customize if you need a different width or length i hope you enjoy whipping up some always cold mitts to keep everyone s hands toasty warm this winter happy knitting **this pattern has been test knit please let me know if you find any errors i m also more than happy to answer any questions **
